definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: In total, only 49 Mersenne primes are known.
sentences.chinese: 目前總共只有49個已知的梅森質數。

sentences.english: The number 17, for example, is prime, because it is divisible only by 1 and 17.
sentences.chinese: 例如17就是質數，因爲它只能被1和17整除。

sentences.english: This is also the key to their usefulness.
sentences.chinese: 這也是質數非常有用的關鍵。

sentences.english: Take the atoms of mathematics, the primes.
sentences.chinese: 例如數學中的原子，質數。

sentences.english: The minimum range of number when extending prime-sieve.
sentences.chinese: 擴充質數篩而找質數時步進的最小間距。

sentences.english: The minimum range of number when extending prime-sieve.
sentences.chinese: 擴充質數篩而找質數時步進的最小間距。

sentences.english: Guide the Number Muncher to all the prime numbers.
sentences.chinese: 引導數字大嘴巴到所有的質數。

sentences.english: If we multiply together all odd primes less than 100, what will be the unit digit of the result?
sentences.chinese: 的奇質數乘起來，所得結果的個位數字是甚麼？

sentences.english: Modern internet codes rely on properties of prime numbers.
sentences.chinese: 現代的網絡代碼依賴於質數的領域。

sentences.english: Reading through a list of primes is like staring at hieroglyphs.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀一系列的質數就像是盯着一大堆的天文數字。

definition: lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
(of marriage or business partners) to break up (idiom)/to separate
see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
stepping stone/fig. person used to advance one's career
supplementary cash reserve/private fund/private hoard/slush fund
